revised_title: A Voyage to the Islands of Madera, Barbadoes, Nieves, St Christophers, and Jamaica
tldr: The author, Hans Sloane, provides a detailed account of his journey to the West Indies, focusing on the natural history of Jamaica, including its flora, fauna, geography, and inhabitants. The book also covers the author's observations on the local climate, food, drink, and customs, as well as the diseases he encountered during his stay.
